price: 15. Alle wuxuu u diyaariyey cadaab daran. Xumaa waxay falaan.
arabic: أَعَدَّ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٗا شَدِيدًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ سَآءَ مَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: aʿadda al-lahu lahum ʿadhāban shadīdan innahum sāa mā kānū yaʿmalūna
